metadata.Title: CVE-2020-10232 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In version 4.8.0 and earlier of The Sleuth Kit (TSK), there is a stack buffer overflow vulnerability in the YAFFS file timestamp parsing logic in yaffsfs_istat() in fs/yaffs.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-10232` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtsk19 - 4.11.1+dfsg-1
sleuthkit - 4.11.1+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sleuthkit package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.11.1+dfsg-1').
